channel.title: CVE Feed for KDDI CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KDDI CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-21780|2024-07-05T17:21:51.936Z -- kddi%20corporation -- home%20spot%20cube2
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HOME SPOT CUBE2 V102 and earlier. Processing a specially crafted command may result in a denial of service (DoS) condition. Note that the affected products are no longer supported.

item.title: CVE-2024-21780|2024-02-02T06:38:19.377Z -- kddi%20corporation -- home%20spot%20cube2
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HOME SPOT CUBE2 V102 and earlier. Processing a specially crafted command may result in a denial of service (DoS) condition. Note that the affected products are no longer supported.

item.title: CVE-2024-21865|2024-03-25T04:11:34.280Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier contains a use of week credentials issue. A network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker may connect to the product via SSH and use a shell.

item.title: CVE-2024-23978|2024-02-02T06:38:33.253Z -- kddi%20corporation -- home%20spot%20cube2
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in HOME SPOT CUBE2 V102 and earlier. By processing invalid values, arbitrary code may be executed. Note that the affected products are no longer supported.

item.title: CVE-2024-29071|2024-06-04T17:56:49.711Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier contains a use of week credentials issue. A network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker may change the system settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-28041|2024-06-04T18:03:25.495Z -- kddi%20corporation -- hgw%20bl1500hm
item.description: HGW BL1500HM Ver 002.001.013 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary command.
